function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic or endemic created by human activities","Impact":"Loss of human lives, fall in global stock market","Mitigation":"Regulation of human activities, environmental stability measures","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies, urban planning tools","People":"Global population, Economies","Owner":"Governments, Environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Exploitation of national crises to push through unpopular and extreme measures on the environment and labour rights","Impact":"Unpopular environmental and labor measures, exploitation of crises","Mitigation":"Transparency, public awareness, government regulation","Technologies":"Environmental impact assessment tools, public information systems","People":"Local communities, Labor force","Owner":"Government, Environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Extremities in pollution and unhygienic levels resulting from human activities","Impact":"Risk to human health, environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Pollution control, sustainable industrial practices","Technologies":"Air and water quality monitoring technologies, sustainable energy solutions","People":"Urban population, Workers in industrial areas","Owner":"Industrial companies, Environmental regulatory bodies"}]}
